\begin{document}
$\chi^{2}=\sum\frac{\left(n_{i}-e_{i}\right)^{2}}{e_{i}}=\sum_{i_{1}=1}^{m_{1}}\sum_{i_{2}=1}^{m_{2}}\ldots\sum_{i_{d}=1}^{m_{d}}\frac{\\\left(n_{i_{1},}{}_{i_{2}\ldots,}{}_{i_{d}}-e_{i_{1},i_{2}\ldots,i_{d}}\right)^{2}}{e_{i_{1},i_{2}\ldots,i_{d}}}$
\end{document}
